name: Ziclofen P 50mg tablet
description: Diclofenac Potassium is a medicine that is used to treat swelling and pain (inflammation) caused by a variety of mild to moderate painful disorders. Muscle pains, backaches, tooth ache, menstruation cramps, as well as sports injuries are all treated with Diclofenac Potassium. It also relieves arthritis-related pain, edema, and joint stiffness. Lowering these symptoms allows you to participate in more of your daily activities. Diclofenac Potassium  is referred to as a nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug (NSAID).
label: medicine
